title: 2025 Afcon: Record winners Egypt face South Africa
summary: It’s a blockbuster clash at the Africa Cup of Nations this Friday, with football heavyweights Egypt facing South Africa. Both sides come into the match with confidence after opening 2–1 wins—Egypt edging past Zimbabwe and South Africa defeating Angola. For more on all the AFCON action, we cross to our sports editor Selina Sykes in Rabat.
